entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers and wet flurries near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
